Signup to participate in an INTERSECT event

Participate

There are multiple ways to contribute to the project or participate in an INTERSECT sponsored event

Bootcamp 2023

See the Bootcamp23 page for details, participation options, and application information.

Workshop 2022

See the Workshop22 page for details and participation options for the 2022 INTERSECT Workshop. Express interest using the Workshop 2022 Participation Form.

Ways to participate

  1. Workshops - If you consider yourself an RSE and
    • you have experience giving research software development training
    • you have never formally served as a trainer
    • you have no interest in being a trainer or giving a workshop, but would like to give your input on the material and skills that are needed in the profession.
  2. Bootcamps - If you have a baseline knowledge and are looking to expand your research software engineering skill set
  3. Asynchronous Training Material - If you want to contribute to the mission of curating and developing specific training topics
Signup form for participation updates and opportunities ›

About This Site

EASI is an NSF funded project entitled "Experiments-As-a-Service-Infrastructure (EASI) to enable a collaborative ecosystem of experimentation in real-world educational settings" More ›
